LayoutData.CloseMessage: Do you want to close this popup?

Children.Text:
Welcome to the HISE Snippet Browser.  

This window is a separate instance of HISE that lets you load different projects next to your main project in order to explore different concepts & best practices.

1. Please choose a **Snippet Directory** on the left tab 
2. click on the **Download** button in order to fetch the latest examples from the [HISE snippet repository](https://github.com/qdr/HiseSnippetDB/).

> In order to learn more about the Snippet browser and how to  contribute snippets check out the [documentation page](https://docs.hise.audio/tutorials/index.html#the-snippet-browser)
